document.full_text: the u.n. security council called an emergency meeting for later on friday to discuss a deadly attack on the u.n. compound in the northern afghan city of mazar-i-sharif.
document.title: u.n. security council to meet on deadly afghan attack
lines_and_colors: the u.n. security council called an emergency meeting for later on friday to discuss a deadly attack on the u.n. compound in the northern afghan city of mazar-i-sharif.
